alert.note: Alert for Jackson (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 08 at 7:32PM CDT by NWS Huntsville
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern Jackson and southern Franklin Counties through 815 PM CDT... At 729 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a broken line of strong thunderstorms which extended from near Winchester to Hollywood. Movement was northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 40 to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Scottsboro, Winchester, Bridgeport, Stevenson, Cowan, Hollywood, Huntland, Skyline, Pisgah and Sewanee. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
